summary: Tested Onboarding Checklist Modal feature for ForgeVoice Studio. All backend API tests (7/7) and frontend UI tests passed. The onboarding modal correctly appears for non-admin users with onboardingComplete=false, has 4 steps with checkboxes, navigation buttons work, and both 'Skip for now' and 'I'm all set' buttons properly dismiss the modal and call the PATCH endpoint.
passed_tests: Backend: PATCH /api/auth/me/onboarding updates onboardingComplete field to true
Backend: PATCH /api/auth/me/onboarding updates onboardingComplete field to false
Backend: GET /api/auth/me includes onboardingComplete in response
Backend: Login response includes onboardingComplete in user object
Backend: PATCH /api/auth/me/onboarding requires authentication (returns 401 without token)
Backend: Admin user can also update onboarding status
Frontend: Client user with onboardingComplete=false sees onboarding modal on login
Frontend: Modal has 4 steps with checkboxes (Brand Brain, Submissions, FVS System, Publishing)
Frontend: Each step has 'Go to...' button that navigates to correct page
Frontend: Modal stays open after 'Go to...' navigation (allows user to complete steps)
Frontend: Ticking all 4 checkboxes shows 'I'm all set â€” let's go!' button
Frontend: Clicking 'Skip for now' dismisses modal and calls PATCH endpoint
Frontend: Clicking 'I'm all set' dismisses modal and calls PATCH endpoint
Frontend: Admin user (admin@forgevoice.com) does NOT see onboarding modal
Frontend: Modal does not reappear after being dismissed (same session)
critical_code_review_comments: Backend correctly defaults existing users without onboardingComplete field to True (backward compatible)
Frontend correctly checks user.role !== 'admin' AND user.onboardingComplete === false to show modal
dismissOnboarding function properly updates local user state after PATCH call
Modal uses proper data-testid attributes for all interactive elements
Checkbox state management with strikethrough styling on completion is well implemented
seed_data_creation: Set alex@company.com onboardingComplete=false for testing modal display
context_for_next_testing_agent: Onboarding modal feature fully tested and working. Modal appears for non-admin users with onboardingComplete=false. All 4 steps (Brand Brain, Submissions, FVS System, Publishing) have checkboxes and navigation buttons. Both dismiss methods (Skip/Complete) call PATCH endpoint and update user state. Admin users never see the modal.
